thread.title: 10 things Narendra Modi said at the Digital India event in Silicon Valley

author: newsr.in
title: 10 things Narendra Modi said at the Digital India event in Silicon Valley
text: Prime Minister Narendra Modi addressed the Who’s Who of the tech world at the Digital India event in the Silicon Valley. Modi reiterated his desire for a connected India where the likes of Facebook, Instagram and Twitter are seen as neighborhoods, and also urged the audience to take an active part in his pet project. Following is the full text of Modi’s speech, and 10 important things worth pointing out in his speech. The most fundamental debate for our youth is the choice between Android, iOS or Windows. We have attacked poverty by using the power of networks and mobile phones to launch a new era of empowerment and inclusion. The pace at which people are taking to digital technology »
